the current spring in Donald Rumsfeld 's step is the resulting abandonment by Barack Obama of much of his strident opposition to President Bush 's anti-terrorism policies. Turning to Dick Cheney at CPAC, Donald Rumsfeld taunted the Left by saying: I look at the current administration's many reversals of their announced policies on national security issues- Guantanamo Bay, military commissions, indefinite detention, CIA drone strikes.
